item.title: Drop party command help:) please
item.dc:creator: @_Troll-Scape ✆™☯Troll-Scape☯™✆
item.description:
@_Troll-Scape wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:377809”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“dropparty”) && playerRights > 2) {
int amountofitemsdropped = 25;
for (int i = 0; i < amountofitemsdropped; i++) {
int droppedItem = misc.random(7000);
createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX-5+misc.random(10), absY-5+misc.random(10), 1);// last number here is the item amount
}

}
[/code]
Creates 25 items in a random area around you…

if you dont have the “void” statement

public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount) { // Phate: creates item at absolute X and Y outStream.createFrame(85); // Phate: Spawn ground item outStream.writeByteC((itemY - 8 * mapRegionY)); outStream.writeByteC((itemX - 8 * mapRegionX)); outStream.createFrame(44); outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(itemID); outStream.writeWord(itemAmount); outStream.writeByte(0); // x(4 MSB) y(LSB) coords // System.out.println("CreateGroundItem "+itemID+" "+(itemX - 8 * // mapRegionX)+","+(itemY - 8 * mapRegionY)+" "+itemAmount); } [/quote]Wow Dude ur beast if you know a command like this for delta ill be willing to REP you

Read full topic

item.title: Drop party command help:) please
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

if (command.startsWith("dropparty") && playerRights > 2) {
        int amountofitemsdropped = 25;
        for (int i = 0; i < amountofitemsdropped; i++) {
                 int droppedItem = misc.random(7000);
                 createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX-5+misc.random(10), absY-5+misc.random(10), 1);// last number here is the item amount
        }

}

Creates 25 items in a random area around you…

if you dont have the “void” statement

	public void createGroundItem(int itemID, int itemX, int itemY,
			int itemAmount) {
		// Phate: creates item at absolute X and Y
		outStream.createFrame(85); // Phate: Spawn ground item
		outStream.writeByteC((itemY - 8 * mapRegionY));
		outStream.writeByteC((itemX - 8 * mapRegionX));
		outStream.createFrame(44);
		outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(itemID);
		outStream.writeWord(itemAmount);
		outStream.writeByte(0); // x(4 MSB) y(LSB) coords
		// System.out.println("CreateGroundItem "+itemID+" "+(itemX - 8 *
		// mapRegionX)+","+(itemY - 8 * mapRegionY)+" "+itemAmount);
	}

Read full topic
